aspguidc.helper

Class NormalizationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • aspguidc.helper.NormalizationHelper

  • public class NormalizationHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class which provides static methods regarding to the normalisation of various strings. The provided methods are used to normalize user input to a uniform format when generating the source code of a logic program.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NormalizationHelper() 

    • Method Summary

      Normalize the string representation of an logical atom.

      • NormalizationHelper

        public NormalizationHelper()

    • Method Detail

      • normalizeAtomString

        public static java.lang.String normalizeAtomString(java.lang.String atomString)
                                            throws InvalidArgumentFormatException
        Normalize the string representation of an logical atom. The normalized representation of an atom does not contain spaces between the arguments of the relation.
        Parameters:
        atomString - string representation of an atom which is normalized
        Returns:
        normalized string representation of the given atom
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentFormatException - if the given string is not a valid atom

      • normalizeAtomTemplate

        public static java.lang.String normalizeAtomTemplate(java.lang.String atomRepresentation)
                                              throws InvalidArgumentFormatException
        Normalize the string representation of an atom template. The normalized representation of an atom template does not contain spaces between the arguments of the relation.
        Parameters:
        atomRepresentation - string representation of an atom template which is normalized
        Returns:
        normalized string representation of the given atom template
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentFormatException - if the given string is not a valid atom template
